column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2019
column14: I have worn this for years and cannot find a better one!  I actually sell cosmetics, including lipstick products for a manufacturer.  I like this lipstick much better mainly because of the coral shade.  It appears like a peachy pink on me.  I receive so many compliments from people and they always ask me what brand and shade it is.  Love it!

column6: Love this lipstick but it immediately broke!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2019
column14: This is my favorite lipstick and color, which I have purchased many times. This one arrived and I immediately noticed the end of the lipstick seemed to be bending to the right. When I slightly raised it to put it on, it broke completely on the end and now I cannot use it at all. I will just have to order from another website or try to find it in a store. One of the few times an Amazon Prime item has disappointed me.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2019
column14: Really good product and beautiful color, but overpriced. This particular color is not found in regular stores anymore and for that reason I find it only on Amazon. That is probably the reason why price is tripled, comparing to same product /manufacturer in a regular store.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
column14: This lipstick is the only one I have found where the color is long lasting and doesn't fade!

column14: This lipstick is NOTHING like original. Canâ€™t return & what a rip off!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2018
column14: The Revlon Moon Drops Frost Lipstick, Crystal Cut Coral 700 is my favorite color, which is not found in the stores anymore. I also like the frost tone.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2019
column14: I was disappointed when I opened the lipstick because the color is not coral, but a pale pink; very different from how it looked in the photo.

column6: REVLON FROST LIPSTICK IN CUT CRYSTAL 700 - THE BEST COLOR FOR ME AND THE BEST OF ALL THE CORALS!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2014
column14: This is the most beautiful color that Revlon makes in the Coral shade.  It goes with everything, too.  I have worn it most of my life, and I get a lot of compliments on it!  I have always loved Revlon lipstick, and it does not even melt if left in a hot place, very easily that is!
